section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Flag to honor and remember members of the armed forces who died in the line of duty" means:
a flag created by Honor and Remember, Inc.; or
the flag designated by the United States Congress as the official symbol to honor and remember members of the armed forces who died in the line of duty.
"POW/MIA flag" means the POW/MIA flag of the National League of Families of American Prisoners and Missing in Southeast Asia.

If the United States Congress designates a flag as the official symbol to honor and remember members of the armed forces who died in the line of duty, the flag designated by Congress shall be flown in accordance with paragraph (1) of this subsection.
